other_tests.findings: There is a 3.4 x 1.6 cm fluid collection surrounding the appendix posterior to the cecum. Edematous appearance of the cecum is most likely secondary to local inflammatory changes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The fluid collection size changed from 2.9 x 3.9 cm on CT to 3.4 x 1.6 cm on ultrasound.
